DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Activity Index (early vs. late activity)
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Activity Index (divided into early and late activity) of three different spring-emerging bee species (O. cornuta, O. bicornis, O. brevicornis) after perfect synchronization and desynchronization with their host plants.
